Goal is to display the comparison amongst the 3 presences. This way the user can determine if there are specific presence/talents that make better combinations.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.DPSDK] Provide a way to evaluate Blood vs. Unholy (vs. frost) Presences

Comments.Message: thanks for putting this up, glad I mentioned it now :)
Really easy, copy the Custom Chart code from any of the other models that have it and then make the calc comparison be one presence vs the other vs no presence
I haven't looked at the code for DPSDK, but is the 15% damage increase with blood presence part of the damage calc currently? or is that a side veriable that you can turn on or off right now?
In the options part of the DK (I'm unholy) there is already a choice between blood and unholy presence. This doesn't work properly, or want even more choices?
